If there is a secondary public opinion, there will be a small peak again. They look different from the network public opinion evolution model displayed on the official website of the Cyberspace Administration. What is abnormal public opinion? Let's randomly select six trending topics related to the same event and present them in a [peak-trough-cliff] pattern. A [peak-trough-cliff] pattern means that a topic quickly rises to the top of the search rankings and attracts public attention; a [tooth-like pattern] means that a topic is periodically heated up, ensuring that it stays on the hot search rankings; a [cliff pattern] means that a topic is abandoned, and its function is exhausted, and it is replaced by a new task or a new battlefield. In Figure 9, the peak of a topic's heat wave is exactly the trough of another topic's heat wave, with no time difference, which means that a unified batch of water troops has been assigned to the task, and a new round of attack has been launched. The professionalization of black PR can be seen everywhere: dozens of trending topics appear at the same time, which topics attract attention, which ones are responsible for explaining, which ones stir up controversy, which ones change direction, which ones affect cognition, which ones mislead judgment, which ones arouse emotions, and which ones manipulate decision-making, black production accounts are divided into batches and nodes, and they are precisely targeted at all elements of public opinion dissemination. Propagation is a science, which ignores subjective factors such as stance and emotion, and only looks at objective data, black PR will also have no place to hide. translation2: Is it safe to use an electric foot spa? Choosing the right foot spa can be very beneficial for foot health. Today, we will answer this question and hope it helps our friends. With the increasing awareness of health, electric foot spas are becoming more popular among consumers. In the market, there are many different types of foot spas available, ranging from a few hundred to thousands of dollars. This gives consumers a lot of choices. According to relevant data, sales of electric foot spas and other health-related household appliances have been booming, but there are no specific industry standards for electric foot spas, so there are certain safety risks. "Dipping your feet in electricity is too dangerous, isn't it?" Li said to the reporter. Recently, he bought an electric foot spa as a birthday gift for his father, but when his father used it, he felt his feet going numb. Li first thought it was the vibration function of the foot spa that caused it, but after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt his feet going numb. Li used an electric pen to test it, and to his surprise, the electric pen lit up. After contacting the seller, the seller's attitude was not bad, but Li still felt uncomfortable after returning the foot spa. Because he found that this popular foot spa did not have any clear and detailed industry regulations regarding the highest temperature setting, the target audience, and the materials used to ensure safety. However, in general, electric foot spas are not likely to have electrical issues, but it is not completely ruled out that some products may have issues during manufacturing. Therefore, when buying, it is recommended to choose a foot spa with a modular design. Water and electricity separation, no safety risks. At the same time, you can test it with an electric pen.

translation2: The Longjiang Dry Dock Realizes Full Coverage of the Green Comprehensive Service Zone on Water - Xinhua News Agency Wuhan 12/11/2021 (Reporter Wang Jing) The Longjiang Dry Dock in Chongqing was successfully completed and put into operation on the 10th, following the successful operation of the Longjiang Green Comprehensive Service Zone in Sichuan Province on the 8th. This marks the second Longjiang Green Comprehensive Service Zone in the upstream of the Longjiang River to be put into operation. As of now, Green Comprehensive Service Zones have been established and put into operation in the upstream, middle, and downstream of the Longjiang River in various provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui, and Jiangsu. The Deputy Director of the Transportation and Communications Department of the Longjiang Navigation Management Bureau, Xu Jianhui, introduced that before this, provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui, and Jiangsu had already established and put into operation 10 Green Comprehensive Service Zones in the upstream, middle, and downstream of the Longjiang River, which have been widely recognized by ship crews and played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Longjiang navigation. The full coverage of Green Comprehensive Service Zones is another milestone event in the construction of Longjiang Green Navigation. The reception of Longjiang River pollution materials and the navigation service capability have been significantly improved. According to the introduction, the Green Comprehensive Service Zone is an important facility that provides comprehensive production and living services for large ships and ship crews, helping large ship crews solve the "urgent difficulty and anxiety" problem. This time, two Green Comprehensive Service Zones have been successfully built and put into operation in the upstream of the Longjiang River, integrating life services, production services, and political services into one body, with the theme of green environmental protection, and with ship repair and ship emergency rescue services as special features, realizing the "one-time docking, multiple services" for ships in the harbor. This will make the work of common ship crews in the Longjiang River more efficient and their living conditions more convenient.

translation2: What is the Red Label Whisky Drinking Law?   Everyone has different tastes, some people like to collect, some people like to eat, of course, some people like to drink whisky. Red Label Whisky is currently one of the most popular Scottish whiskies in many countries, and it has won the gold award in the International Whisky Competition.   Each bottle of Red Label Whisky has a unique taste, but if you don't know how to taste it, you might ruin its aroma. So, how do you drink Red Label Whisky?   Our editor will simply introduce it to you.   Red Label Whisky Drinking Law:   Red Label Whisky is made from a blend of 35 different Scottish whiskies, with a rich, complex aroma and the traditional taste of Scottish whisky. The aroma contains sweet and smoky flavors.   When you take a sip, the alcohol is clear and refreshing, with a hint of grass and a strong, smoky malt flavor. Red Label Whisky can be drunk directly on ice or mixed with your favorite drink.   Red Label Whisky entered China, and for the Chinese palate, Red Label Whisky + Coca-Cola or Sprite or Sprite Zero became a popular trend. These sweet drinks not only balance the acidity but also give a visual pleasure. Adding them to the drink changes the taste and mouthfeel of the whisky.   The most traditional and authentic way to drink Red Label Whisky is with a slice of lemon and honey (honey can also be used). The honey adds a sweetness that balances the acidity of the whisky, while the lemon gives the whisky a fresh, clean aroma. Of course, the sweetness and acidity can be adjusted according to personal taste.   These three are the best ways to drink Red Label Whisky, and we hope our introduction can help you.

translation2: The First Contemporary Art Biennial Exhibition of Saudi Arabia Opens - Xinhua News Agency 12/12/2021 (Reporter Wang Haizhou, Hu Qiang) The First Contemporary Art Biennial Exhibition of Saudi Arabia - Xinhua News Agency 12/12/2021 (Reporter Wang Haizhou, Hu Qiang)  The First Contemporary Art Biennial Exhibition of Saudi Arabia opened on November 11 at the JAX Art Zone in Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia and other countries participated in the exhibition. The exhibition was jointly organized by the Saudi Binladin Group and the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in Beijing, China. The director of the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in Beijing, China, Tian Hao Yu, served as the art director. According to the organizers, the theme of the exhibition is "Touching Stones to Cross the River," which symbolizes the reform strategies adopted during the period of social and economic transformation, as well as the current development situation of Saudi Arabian society. The exhibition occupies an area of nearly 12,000 square meters and consists of six interconnected buildings, presenting six units: "Touching Stones to Cross the River," "Inheritance as Experiment," "Edge Thinking," "Facing the Public," "Beautiful New World," and "The Spirit of Art." Among them, 27 Saudi Arabian artists' works account for more than 40% of the total number of exhibits, including paintings, installation art, and performance art, among others. Similarly, 12 Chinese artists' works are also attracting attention, with some artists using recycled materials to create art in a new way, such as Xu Bing in the "Behind the Scenes Series: The Endless Mountains" (2014), who reconstructed a classic mountain landscape painting using discarded materials. According to the Saudi Binladin Group, the goal of the exhibition is to establish international dialogue and provide global audiences with an opportunity to understand the rapidly developing cultural industry and creative community in Saudi Arabia, as well as to strengthen mutual communication. Tian Hao Yu said, "The goal of the exhibition is double-folded: to allow Saudi contemporary art to participate in global dialogue and to allow Saudi audiences to immerse themselves in the contemporary art world." It is reported that during the opening period of the exhibition, a series of lectures will also be held, with artists, curators, and leaders in the creative industry discussing topics such as cross-cultural communication and the development of contemporary art.

translation2: 48小时核酸阴性、设“缓冲区 ” 国务院联防联控机制发文要求加强口岸城市疫情防控-新华网 新华社北京12月11日电（记者董瑞丰、顾天成）国务院联防联控机制日前印发关于加强口岸城市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知，要求近期离开陆地边境口岸城市（与香港、澳门有口岸相连的除外）人员需持有48小时内核酸检测阴性证明，前往陆地边境口岸城市人员抵达后至少进行1次核酸检测。 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。 此外，通知还提出，有条件的口岸城市可研究在辖区内设置疫情防控缓冲区。 国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局有关负责人介绍，对于一些口岸城市来说，跨境边贸是当地主要经济支柱，双方边民往来频繁。 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。 近期我国发生多起本土聚集性疫情，均是境外疫情经口岸城市输入。 上述通知指出，这暴露出一些地方疫情监测预警不及时、高风险岗位人员闭环管理不落实、定期核酸检测流于形式、冷链物品各环节消杀不到位、集中隔离场所管理不规范、疫情应急处置不够科学精准等问题。 通知要求，从完善口岸城市疫情防控机制、健全疫情监测预警体系、落实边境管控措施等9个方面着力，加快补齐口岸城市防控短板弱项，毫不放松、科学精准做好防控工作，织密扎牢外防输入防线。 通知强调，各口岸城市要将疫情防控与民生保障工作同步研究、同步部署，公布并畅通民生保障热线，定期排查基本生活物资供应、价格等方面的苗头隐患，及时解决和主动回应群众反应的突出问题。 根据通知，其中所指的口岸城市包括开放的陆路、水路、航空口岸所在县（市、区、旗 ） 、 所在市（地、州、盟）及所在直辖市，具体范围由各省（自治区、直辖市）根据疫情防控需要确定并及时公告。

Chinese to English Translation:  On May 23rd, 2021, over 130 Chinese American organizations submitted a complaint to the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice, accusing three well-known Ivy League universities - Yale University, Brown University, and Duke University - of discriminating against Chinese American applicants during the recruitment process. The head of the Chinese American Education Association (CAEA) announced at a press conference that over the past 10 years, the number of Chinese American applicants who meet the criteria for admission to Ivy League universities has grown exponentially, but the proportion of Chinese Americans in these three universities has remained relatively stable.  Numerous studies have shown that these universities discriminate against Chinese American applicants in the so-called "comprehensive evaluation" recruitment process. The CAEA introduced that according to research by Sedgwick et al. in 2014, the relative number of applicants and the acceptance rate of Chinese Americans in these three universities is the lowest among all ethnic groups. The US Department of Education's data also shows that in all Ivy League schools, Duke University and Brown University have the lowest acceptance rates for Chinese American students, while Yale University and Brown University have implemented a de facto quota system for Chinese American applicants for over 20 years.  The CAEA hopes that after submitting the complaint, the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice will conduct an investigation and take action to stop these universities from continuing to discriminate against Chinese Americans in recruitment. The CAEA also hopes that the three universities will actively address this issue and change their recruitment policies. As of now, the three universities have not responded to the complaint. The Chinese American Education Association was founded in 2015 and previously submitted a complaint against Harvard University for discriminating against Chinese American applicants, but the US Department of Education rejected it on the grounds of procedure. This time, in addition to Chinese American organizations, other organizations such as Indian American, Korean American, Japanese American, and Pakistani American education organizations also participated in the complaint.

translation2: The "Harmony Rescue-2021" Joint Exercise Between the Chinese and Yemeni Armies Ends Successfully-Xinhua News Agency   On December 12th, the Chinese and Yemeni armies successfully completed the "Harmony Rescue-2021" Joint Exercise in China's Guangxi Province, marking the successful completion of the 7-day training task. This exercise focused on the major theme of humanitarian medical rescue, closely linked to the mission of the Yemeni Red Cross, and completed the joint Red Cross command, joint field rescue, and mass injury treatment according to the standards of real-world operations. This effectively improved the two armies' Red Cross protection capabilities. The results of the exercise were confirmed by the Chinese and Yemeni armies.   Yemeni Army Exercise Leadership Committee Chairman and Deputy Chief of Staff of the Yemeni People's Liberation Army Medical Corps, Major General Amir Xiongsheng, spoke at the closing ceremony of the exercise, saying that through this exercise, the Yemeni Army Medical Corps learned about the organization and professional activities of the Chinese Army Medical Corps from the Chinese Army Medical Corps, and also saw the Chinese Army's medical and rescue equipment. The results of the exercise proved that the medical and rescue capabilities of the Chinese and Yemeni armies in medical assistance and disease prevention are at a professional level.   Chinese Army Exercise Command and Coordination Group Leader and Deputy Director of the Central Military Commission's Logistics Support Department's Medical Corps, Lieutenant General Chen Chunming, said at the closing ceremony of the exercise that this exercise was based on the successful holding of the 2018 Joint Humanitarian Medical Activity, and was again expanded and innovated, with great importance. During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective suits, and rapid nucleic acid detection instruments to the Yemeni People's Liberation Army for public health purposes.
